name: Design System Starter Kit (Sneak Preview)
description:
Design System Starter Kit is a Figma-first library of lightly styled components to kickstart or supplement design system projects.


This file‘s a work in progress. Some things don’t work quite right, some things aren’t done, some things are missing.


Feedback is welcome : ) Feel free to comment on the file or email nortonking@hey.com


We're taking requests too. Let us know if you haven’t been able to find a specific component in the Community


Things that are missing

  • Interactive components
  • Mobile components
  • Dark mode


How to use the file

Instead of adopting and restyling the entire file, gradually copy and adapt components to your project or design system, as you need them.


Appendix

Here’s a direct link to the file. Feel free to drop in
